summary: The module offers utilities for analyzing the implementation status of AWS CloudFormation resources within the Moto library. It defines a checklist class that determines whether a resource can be created, deleted, or updated, and reports expected versus missing attributes along with model and service identifiers. Additional helper functions support status checks, formatting, and documentation generation.
business_intent: Enable developers and contributors to quickly assess and document the coverage of CloudFormation resources in Moto, facilitating targeted improvements, better test planning, and clearer communication of implementation gaps.
